response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its high value and utility, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it a fantastic opportunity for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 9500}
